name: Project J Ltd
description: Developer of an online shopping platform designed to offer fashion accessories. The company's platform offers jewelry, watches, wall art, electronics and beauty products and also provides free shipping facilities, enabling users to get assured quality products at a reasonable price.
one_liner: Developer of an online shopping platform designed to offer fashion accessories. The company's platform offers jewelry, watches, wall art, electronics and beauty products and also provides free shipping facilities, enabling users to get assured quality products at a reasonable price.
